mods.abstract: Performance along with discussion by Brandy Clark, Jillian Jacqueline, Carly Pearce, Maggie Rose, and Lucie Silvas from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 9, 2017. Hosted by CMT executive Leslie Fram.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
